mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.order_id AS "orderId", a.goods_nbr AS "goodsNbr", a.goods_size AS "goodsSize", a.import_channel_price AS "importChannelPrice", a.import_channel_refund AS "importChannelRefund", a.import_date AS "importDate"
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO fx_order_finance_import( id, order_id, goods_nbr, goods_size, import_channel_price, import_channel_refund, import_date ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{orderId}, #{goodsNbr}, #{goodsSize}, #{importChannelPrice}, #{importChannelRefund}, #{importDate} )
mapper.update: UPDATE fx_order_finance_import SET order_id = #{orderId}, goods_nbr = #{goodsNbr}, goods_size = #{goodsSize}, import_channel_price = #{importChannelPrice}, import_channel_refund = #{importChannelRefund}, import_date = #{importDate} WHERE id = #{id}
